name: Sail (Falkisen)
description:
A treasure map has just got into a sailors hands, and the treasure maps reveals four islands with different treasures. Help the sailor to travel between the islands and solve different puzzles to earn a great forturne!

Controls:

Move - Left, right

Jump - Space

Grab - X

Restart - R

No sound?

Try reinstalling DirectX if the game doesn't play audio.
